text: Mohammed Al-Majhad (; born 16 July 1998) is a Saudi Arabian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Saudi Pro League side Al-Ahli and the Saudi Arabian national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=2|League !colspan=2|King Cup !colspan=2|Asia !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan=3 |Al-Fateh |2017–18 |7||0||0||0||colspan=2|—||1||0||8||0 |- |2018–19 |27||4||2||0||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||29||4 |- !Total !34!!4!!2!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!37!!4 |- ! colspan=2 | Career totals !34!!4!!2!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!37!!4 |} ===International=== :Statistics accurate as of match played 10 August 2019. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width="120"|Team !width="60"|Year !width="45"|Apps !width="45"|Goals |- |rowspan=10|Saudi Arabia |- |2019||2||0 |- !Total||2||0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Al-Fateh SC players Category:Al-Ahli Saudi FC players Category:Saudi Arabia youth international footballers Category:Saudi Arabia international footballers Category:People from Al-Hasa
